description: Variation of Condition 2 (approved plans) to allow introduction of two windows to the western elevation at third floor level of planning permission 00590/3-8/P5 approved 04/03/2019 for erection of an additional floor to existing building in a 'mansard' style to provide three self-contained flats (Use Class C3) and replacement of existing third floor mansard with straightened walls, plus external alterations to facilitate same.
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Received: 08/07/2020 PE30 Rev: A; PE30 F; A17/SA306 /01 Received: 09/10/2018 AP10 Rev: D; EE00; EE01; PE31; PP302; PS02; SS01 Rev: A; Unnumbered Distances Plan; Received: 14/11/2018, PP300 Rev: E; PS30 Rev: C) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces shall be those approved by planning permission 00590/3-8/P5(3i-8i) on 31 July 2019.

Condition : 3 - No demolition or construction work shall take place on the site except between the hours of 8:00am  to 6:00pm on Mondays to Friday and 9 :00am to 1:00pm on Saturdays and none shall take place on Sundays and Public Holidays without the prior agreement of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 4 - The cycle parking provision for the development shall be those approved by planning permission 00590/3-8/P5(5-13) on 12 December 2019. The approved details shall be fully implemented and made available for use before the first occupation of the development hereby approved

Condition : 5 - The waste and recycled material storages for the development shall be in line with those approved by planning permission 00590/3-8/P5(5-13) on 12 December 2019. The approved details shall be fully implemented prior to the occupation and thereafter retained.

Condition : 6 - The residents of the development shall comply with the agreed arrangements for the resident?s parking permit in line with the approved by planning permission 00590/3-8/P5(5-13) on 12 December 2019.
Condition : 7 - The Construction Management Plan shall be carried out in accordance with the details approved by planning permission 00590/3-8/P5(3i-8i) on 31 July 2019.
Condition : 8 - The Energy Strategy for the development shall be in line with those approved by planning permission 00590/3-8/P5(5-13) on 12 December 2019.
Condition : 9 - The Internal Water Use calculations and how it is achieved for the development shall be in line with those approved by planning permission 00590/3-8/P5(5-13) on 12 December 2019.
Condition : 10 - The development shall be built in line with the approved sustainable construction materials by planning permission 00590/3-8/P5(5-13) on 12 December 2019.

Condition : 11 - The Parking Management Plan shall be carried out in accordance with the details approved by planning permission 00590/3-8/P5(5-13) on 12 December 2019. The site shall thereafter be managed in compliance with the approved Parking Management Plan.
Condition : 12 - The Solar PV Panels for the development shall be installed in accordance with the details approved by planning permission 00590/3-8/P5(5-13) on 12 December 2019.
